overview: Diana is a troubled girl who blames her father for causing the death of her mother and for only listening to what her stepmother said. She has a problem trusting men until she met Haikal, a men who doesn't trust women after finding his fianc√©e, Sabrina cheating on him. Just when the two lovebirds are about to gain each other's trust, Sabrina returns and tries to prevent them from getting together.
title: Janji Diana
